content:
Smetan family

1 Izer SMETAN                        1754-55 - 1812 #23 (Abraham+Gentla)
 + Cwetla                            1742
 + Breundel                          1759-60
       married Mar 13, 1803 Krakow
  2o Jentla SMETAN                   1809 - after 1810
    * Joel ADLER                     1803 - Oct 16, 1873 #955
          married Jun 15, 1827 #28
        FAMILY LISTING
